refnamediv.refpurpose: Given an object ID or a row identity string returned by row_identity, retrieves the actual row

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Given an object ID or a row identity string returned by row_identity, retrieves the actual row.
id: A row identity string or object ID object.
Is_exclusive: If non-zero, the row retrieved is locked exclusively. This is useful when intending to delete or update the row in the same transaction.

note.title: Note:
note.para: NULL if returned if there is no row referenced. This can happen if the identity was retrieved in a previous transaction and the row was deleted afterwards.

example.title: Example:
